title: Analysis | Every Russia story Trump said was a hoax by Democrats: A timeline
subtitle: A look at the past year's developments in the Trump-Russia saga, and everything Trump blamed on the Democrats.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
vclaim: “The Russia story is a faux story. And it started, really, before the election was over, before November 8th. And it was at a very low level, and it never picked up any steam until after the election because the Democrats are using that faux — or fake — Russia story in order to make themselves feel better for losing an election that’s very hard for a Democrat to lose.” ( April 28, Washington Examiner “It’s impossible for Republican to win. And not only did I won I won easily. So they made up this Russia thing to try and deflect because they’re embarrassed by what happened. The Russia is a phony — what do you see is the Russia story? The Russia story. And you see all of these other phony stories. (April 28, Fox News)
